alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Guadalupe County; Quay County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 1:55AM MST until February 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Curry County, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Roosevelt County and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous crosswinds are likely on southeast-northwest roadways, such as U.S. Highways 285 and 84. Areas of blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Guadalupe County; Quay County; Roosevelt County
